original_text: But if you are kind to some people and you are not kind to others, then you are doing a bad thing. God's Law shows that you are wrong.
korean_text: 만일 너희가 사람을 차별하여 대하면 죄를 짓는 것이니 율법이 너희를 범법자로 정죄하리라

sentences.original_text: But if you are kind to some people
and you are not kind to others
then you are doing a bad thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 당신이 나쁜 일을 하는 것입니다

sentences.original_text: God's Law shows that you are wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 법은 당신이 틀렸다는 것을 보여줍니다
